mapper.insert: insert into commission (category, cost, installRatio, debugRatio, install, debug, disclose, `check`, head, headDoor, headDisclose, installContribute, debugContribute, itemId) value ( #{category}, #{cost}, #{installRatio}, #{debugRatio}, #{install}, #{debug}, #{disclose}, #{check}, #{head}, #{headDoor}, #{headDisclose}, #{installContribute}, #{debugContribute}, #{itemId} )
